meanings.definition: A person who engages in conversation.
meanings.sent1: The group of conversationalists at the party discussed various topics.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the best conversationalists in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The conversationalists at the coffee shop had a lively debate about the best type of coffee.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of introverts, she stood out like a conversationalist at a silent retreat.
meanings.sent5: The elderly couple were skilled conversationalists, sharing stories of their youth with great enthusiasm.

meanings.sent1: The conversationalists skills of the teacher made the class engaging.
meanings.sent2: His conversationalist style made it easy for people to approach him.
meanings.sent3: The conversationalist atmosphere at the dinner party made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with conversationalist charm as she spoke about her travels.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with a warm, conversationalist vibe during the family gathering.
